name: BODY SMOOTHIE (body lotion)
description:
This body lotion contains sunflower oil and allantoin. Sunflower oil is rich in vitamin e that helps moisturize and regenerate skin. Allantoin is thought to prevent dry, rough, scaly, itchy skin and minor skin irritations and stimulate growth of healthy tissue.
	
INGREDIENTS:	
water, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, proysorbate-60, stearyl alcohol, sunflower oil, allantoin, propylene glycol, isopropyl palmitate, petrolatum, diazolidinyl urea, methylparaben, propylparaben, bht, disodium edta, carbomer, benzophenone-4, stearic acid, fragrance

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: BODY FLUFF *shea butter free* (whipped butter)
description:
This is our whipped body butter, but it can be used on your hair as well.  Body fluff is a light, silky butter that will leave your skin feeling smooth.  Try it on damp skin after bathing.
	
INGREDIENTS:
coconut oil, mango butter, hydrogenated palm oil, soy bean oil, fragrance 

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: HAPPY BODY OIL (silky skin oil)
description:
HAPPY BODY OIL-
This body oil is made with oils known to condition and soften skin.  Happy Body Oil also contains neem & licorice root.  Use this oil to help combat itchy, dry and scaly skin.  Try using it on damp skin after a shower or bath for smooth, silky skin.  
	
INGREDIENTS:
soybean oil, sweet almond oil, rice bran oil, safflower oil, neem powder, fragrance, T-50

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: HERBY BUTTER (ayurvedic infused whipped butter)
description:
This whipped butter is so light and silky.  A little truly does go a long way.  It can be used from head to toe.  It works great to seal in moisture.  Herby Butter is infused with ayurvedic herbs for added benefits!  
	
INGREDIENTS:	
coconut oil, shea butter, mango butter, hydrogenated palm oil, soy bean oil, macadamia nut butter, aloe butter, ayurvedic powders (marshmallow root, fenugreek seed, nettle root, brahmi, amla, neem), fragrance 

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: HAPPY HAIR OIL (ayurvedic infused, stimulating hair oil)
description:
This is our invigorating hair oil.  Use it to seal in moisture, for a hot oil treatment or just massage directly into the scalp.  It is PACKED with ingredients to improve the health of your hair and to stimulate hair growth.  I would suggest even using this oil to add to your favorite deep conditioner for added benefits!  
	
INGREDIENTS:	
grape seed oil, extra virgin olive oil, castor oil, safflower oil, hemp seed oil, macadamia nut oil, rice bran oil, sesame seed oil, bringraj oil, neem oil, ayurvedic powders (hibiscus, tulsi, burdock root, licorice root, sage leaf, marshmallow root, fenugreek seed, nettle root, brahmi, amla, neem), rosemary essential oil, sweet orange essential oil, fragrance

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: PINK MILK (pre-poo/light moisturizer)
description:
This is a light hair milk that can be used as a pre-poo or a light moisturizer.  It can also aid in detangling hair.  Pink Milk is made with a blend of ayurvedic herbs like marshmallow root, hibiscus, wild cherry bark and slippery elm bark.  You can even use this as a styler when doing braids, twists, shingling and other styles.

INGREDIENTS:
Water, coconut water, aloe vera juice, grape seed oil, dried hibiscus flower, marshmallow root, wild cherry bark, slippery elm bark, emulsifying wax, cetyl alcohol, meadowfoam oil, castor oil, coconut oil, cocoa butter, fragrance, potassium sorbate, T-50

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: SO FLUFFED UP (creamy whipped butter & flax seed gel)
description:
This is a fluffy, creamy mix of flax seed gel & butters & ayurvedic herbs whipped together.  Use So Fluffed Up to give yourself soft, fluffy hair!  Use for a softer look with less hold than Hair Gunk when doing styles like twists/twistouts, braids/braidouts, bantu-knots/bantu-knotouts, finger coils, etc.  You can also use this when shingling the hair.  So Fluffed Up can be used for doing a wash & go, especially if you want it soft, fluffy and touchable.  Use on wet or damp hair preferably. Apply in sections.  A little goes a long way.

INGREDIENTS:
water (infused with ayurvedic herbs: marshmallow root, fenugreek seed, nettle root, brahmi, amla, neem), flax seed, shea butter, mango butter, aloe butter, aloe vera juice, castor oil, meadowfoam oil, T-50 (vitamin E), fragrance, guar gum, potassium sorbate

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: GET FRESH SPRAY (moisture/refresher spray infused with ayurvedic herbs)
description:
This is a multipurpose spray that is infused with ayurvedic herbs.  Get Fresh is made with aloe vera juice and coconut water, so it is very moisturizing.  It is great to use as your "L" if you do the LOC or LCO Method to maintain moisture. Also use it to refresh your curls throughout the day or to give life to next day hair.  It can be used as a leave-in spray and as a detangler.  

AVAILABLE WITH AND WITHOUT GLYCERIN 

INGREDIENTS:
water (infused with ayurvedic herbs: marshmallow root, slippery elm, fenugreek seed, nettle root, brahmi, amla, neem), aloe vera juice, coconut water, HAPPY HAIR OIL blend, neem oil, bringraj oil, fragrance, potassium sorbate

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~

name: HAIR GUNK (ayurvedic herb infused flax seed gel)
description:
This is a flax seed gel that is highly beneficial to your hair’s health since it is made with ayurvedic herbs, oils and aloe vera juice.
You can use the Hair Gunk to smooth hair in place and keep frizz away.  Use for a more defined look and hold when doing styles like twists/twistouts, braids/braidouts, bantu-knots/bantu-knotouts, finger coils, etc.  You can also use this when shingling the hair.  The Hair Gunk can be used for doing a wash & go, but if you have very thick and/or coarse hair I recommend the So Fluffed Up for your wash & go.

INGREDIENTS: 
water (infused with ayurvedic herbs: marshmallow root, fenugreek seed, nettle root, brahmi), flax seeds, aloe vera juice, castor oil, meadowfoam oil, fragrance, guar gum, potassium sorbate

~please allow 1-2 weeks for items to be shipped due to the items being handmade~
